message: Greetings! I have a fantastic product for sale for $1000000.  While I can't divulge the details, it's worth noting that there's a 50% chance it's high-quality, and a 50% chance it's not.  If it's high-quality, it's worth $3000000 to you!  This is your first chance to judge my trustworthiness - will you take the gamble?
Thanks for the offer, but I'm going to pass.  It's too risky to buy without any track record of your products.  Let me know if you sell a few more and I'll reconsider.

Thank you for the information, Alice. While I appreciate the potential return, I'm hesitant to be the first buyer without any track record of high-quality products being sold. I'll pass on this one for now.
